property.name: rpc.client.timeout
property.description: Timeout interval of a RPC invocation in millisecond. Default is 3600000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.tcpnodelay
property.description: Whether to set socket TCP_NODELAY to true when connecting to RPC server. Default is true.

property.name: rpc.client.max.idle
property.description: Max idle time of a RPC connection in milliseconds. Default is 10000.

property.name: rpc.client.ping.interval
property.description: Interval at which the RPC client sends a heart beat to server. 0 means disable, default is 10000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.timeout
property.description: Timeout interval in milliseconds for which RPC client tries to setup the connection. Default is 600000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.retry
property.description: Max retry attempts if the RPC client fails to setup the connection to server. Default is 10.

property.name: rpc.client.read.timeout
property.description: Timeout interval in milliseconds when the RPC client is trying to read from server. Default is 3600000.

property.name: rpc.client.write.timeout
property.description: Timeout interval in milliseconds when the RPC client is trying to write to server. Default is 3600000.

property.name: rpc.client.socket.linger.timeout
property.description: Set value to socket SO_LINGER when connecting to RPC server. -1 means default OS value. Default is -1.

property.name: yarn.client.failover.max.attempts
property.description: If multiple resource managers are configured, it is the max retry attempts for which yarn client tries to issue a RPC call. Default is 15.
